github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/jaeg.description: NestedConfig is a nested configuration struct for testing

RetryCount.description: RetryCount is the number of retries

Timeout.description: Timeout is the timeout in seconds

github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/jaeg.title: github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/jaeger/internal/configschema/testdata.TestConfig
github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/jaeg.description: TestConfig is a simple struct for testing schema generation

Addresses.description: Addresses is a list of addresses to connect to

Enabled.description: Enabled determines if the service is enabled

Name.description: Name is the name of the configuration

OptionalConfig.description: OptionalConfig is an optional nested configuration

Port.description: Port is the port to listen on

Tags.description: Tags are key-value pairs for metadata
